name: Wrap--newborn photography prop--OOAK--Ready to Ship
description:
Knit Robin's Egg blue mohair, woven through in hand-dyed ribbons, and finished with fringe.

A stunning (and versatile), one-of-a-kind addition to your photography arsenal.

Wrap (not including fringe) measures 3.5 feet in length, 2 feet in width. Wrap (including fringe) measures 5 feet in length, 2 feet in width (fringe not on long sides of wrap).

Uses include:

Wrapping Babe as in a blanket

Nestling wrap in bowl, allowing beautiful ribbons to drape over sides

Cocooning Babe

OR

Using as a shawl for an adult photo session

On a table for an eclectic product photography session


**Item is Ready to Ship immediately with Delivery Confirmation.**
